# LayoutDirectionBehavior.fixed

**Case**

A behavior that doesn’t mirror when the layout direction changes.

## Declaration

```swift
case fixed
```

## Getting behaviors

- **mirrors**: A behavior that mirrors when the layout direction is right-to-left.
- **LayoutDirectionBehavior.mirrors(in:)**: A behavior that mirrors when the layout direction has the specified value.

items.description: A behavior that mirrors when the layout direction is right-to-left.
items.name: mirrors

items.description: A behavior that mirrors when the layout direction has the specified value.
